from pyspark.ml.feature import (
    MinHashLSH,
    BucketedRandomProjectionLSH,
    VarianceThresholdSelector,

[docs]class SparkTransformerFactory:
    """
    A Factory class to register all supported transformers/estimators in Spark
    """
    def __init__(self):
        """
        Function to initialize object and register supported transformers/estimators
        """
        self._transformers = {}
        self.register_transformer()


[docs]    def register_transformer(self):
        """
        Function to register a transformer/estimator
        """
        self._transformers["Tokenizer"] = Tokenizer
        self._transformers["HashingTF"] = HashingTF
        self._transformers["TF-IDF"] = IDF
        self._transformers["Word2Vec"] = Word2Vec
        self._transformers["CountVectorizer"] = CountVectorizer
        self._transformers["FeatureHasher"] = FeatureHasher
        self._transformers["StopWordsRemover"] = StopWordsRemover
        self._transformers["NGram"] = NGram
        self._transformers["Binarizer"] = Binarizer
        self._transformers["PCA"] = PCA
        self._transformers["PolynomialExpansion"] = PolynomialExpansion
        self._transformers["DCT"] = DCT
        self._transformers["StringIndexer"] = StringIndexer
        self._transformers["IndexToString"] = IndexToString
        self._transformers["OneHotEncoder"] = OneHotEncoder
        self._transformers["VectorIndexer"] = VectorIndexer
        self._transformers["Interaction"] = Interaction
        self._transformers["Normalizer"] = Normalizer
        self._transformers["StandardScaler"] = StandardScaler
        self._transformers["RobustScaler"] = RobustScaler
        self._transformers["MinMaxScaler"] = MinMaxScaler
        self._transformers["MaxAbsScaler"] = MaxAbsScaler
        self._transformers["Bucketizer"] = Bucketizer
        self._transformers["ElementwiseProduct"] = Bucketizer
        self._transformers["SQLTransformer"] = SQLTransformer
        self._transformers["VectorAssembler"] = VectorAssembler
        self._transformers["VectorSizeHint"] = VectorSizeHint
        self._transformers["QuantileDiscretizer"] = QuantileDiscretizer
        self._transformers["Imputer"] = Imputer
        self._transformers["VectorSlicer"] = VectorSlicer
        self._transformers["RFormula"] = RFormula
        self._transformers["ChiSqSelector"] = ChiSqSelector
        self._transformers["UnivariateFeatureSelector"] = UnivariateFeatureSelector
        self._transformers["VarianceThresholdSelector"] = VarianceThresholdSelector
        self._transformers["BucketedRandomProjectionLSH"] = BucketedRandomProjectionLSH
        self._transformers["MinHashLSH"] = MinHashLSH
        self._transformers["IDF"] = IDF



[docs]    def get_transformer(self, transformer, kwargs=None):
        
        """
        Gets a transformer/estimator from registry
        Arguments:
        transformer (string) : name of transformer/estimator to be added to Pipeline
        Returns:
        Transformer/Estimator Object
        """
        transformer_ = self._transformers.get(transformer)
        return transformer_(**kwargs)
